handist.collections.dist.util

Class LazyObjectReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.util.LazyObjectReference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the object being referenced
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemberOfLazyObjectReference

    public class LazyObjectReference<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class used as a substitute when serializing an object. This class allows us to delay the initialization of an object on a remote place until an asynchronous remote activity is actually executed on this remote host.
    See Also:
    MemberOfLazyObjectReference, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      apgas.util.GlobalID globalId
      Global ID used to identify an object with replication on multiple places
      apgas.SerializableCallable<T> initializer
      Initializer called when an object replicated on multiple hosts has not yet been allocated in a local object.
      TeamedPlaceGroup placeGroup
      Place group on which the object of interest can be allocated on
